data.event: The first post office was opened in 1949.

event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1964

data.event: Linden was incorporated as a village in 1964.
In the 2011 Census, the Village of Linden had a population of 725 living in 293 of its 315 total dwellings, a 9.8% change from its 2006 population of 660.
